TERM: Personalized Medicine

DEFINITION:

62. AI-Driven Healthcare: Mastermind_AI is designed to provide advanced healthcare capabilities to improve patient outcomes:
    * Disease Diagnosis: Developing disease diagnosis techniques that enable the AI system to accurately diagnose diseases and conditions.
    * Personalized Medicine: Implementing personalized medicine techniques that enable the AI system to tailor treatment plans to individual patients' needs.
    * Health Monitoring: Creating health monitor
